thread.section_title: Cruise Sale Finder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruise Sale Finder | www.cruisesalefinder.co.nz
thread.title: Raymond Hina
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Raymond Hina

author: Raymond Hina
title: Raymond Hina
text:
WOW a call center that answers within a few minutes. They were awesome and didn't make any issues clear communication native English speakers as well. very very helpful recommend to all for their prompt help and advice.
Had called P and O directly before hand 40 minute wait and could speak English well enough and no help. call Cruise sale finder don't call the cruise line for all your cruise booking! many thanks
